sdk.title: Prototype and build your connected object
sdk.intro:
To quickly and easily prototype your connected object, discover the development boards validated by Orange and get our Software Development kits (SDKs).
Keep focus on your service and your users we take care of the rest!

discover.title: Discover
discover.sentence: Buy the hardware or use your own compatible boards to get started.

register.title: Register
register.sentence: Request an account on Live Objects developer website.

develop.title: Develop
develop.sentence: Start building your applications using our Discover Offer.

launch.title: Launch
launch.sentence: Contact our teams to support you start & grow your business.

evolve.title: Evolve
evolve.sentence: Deploy your devices at scale using our Saas platform.

lora.title: Orange explorer LoRa® kit
lora.sentence: In collaboration with Microship, Orange is providing a development board that allows easy and quick prototyping of IoT objects and services using LoRa® technology.

items.2: All documentation provided: user guide, example code, Orange libraries
items.3: LoRa® module identifiers read by QR code directly on the board
items.4: Access to Live Objects platform for device and data management
items.5: Free access to LoRa® network for 3 months (then the price per device per month varies between 1€ and 2€ according to commitment)

arm.title: ARM mbed
arm.sentence: In collaboration with ARM, Orange is providing a SDK for developers and startups to quickly and easily prototype an end-to-end IoT solution.

nxp.title: NXP K64F board
nxp.description: NXP K64F development board, K64 MCU (MK64FN1M0VLL12) based on ARM Cortex ® M4, 256K RAM, 1MB flash).

nucleo.title: Nucleo board
nucleo.description: ST Microelectronics NUCLEO-F429ZI development board, STM32 MCU based on ARM Cortex M4.

arduino.title: Arduino
arduino.compatibility: Compatible Arduino development boards (and IDE Arduino compatible)

mediatek.title: Mediatek LinkIt One board
mediatek.description: Mediatek LinkIt One (Recommended for performance purpose).

pi2.title: Pi 2 Model B board
pi2.description: Raspberry Pi 2 model B, quad-core ARM Cortex-A7 CPU.

pi3.title: Pi 3 Model B board
pi3.description: Raspberry Pi 3 model B, quad-core ARMv8 CPU.
